meanings.sent1: She looked cozy in her sweatered outfit.
meanings.sent2: The sweatered boy smiled warmly in the chilly weather.
meanings.sent3: The sweatered cat seemed to purr even louder.
meanings.sent4: The sweatered trees stood out against the snowy landscape.
meanings.sent5: The sweatered dog wagged its tail happily.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with a sweater
meanings.sent1: The sweatered chair looked inviting in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The sweatered lamp post added a festive touch to the street.
meanings.sent3: The sweatered car was a unique sight on the road.
meanings.sent4: The sweatered house blended well with the winter scenery.
meanings.sent5: The sweatered mailbox stood out among the plain ones.
